message: First
Second. The system will use A.I. to learn about your interests and when you search something, like a trip or a restaurant or whatever, Wup will show results with more relevance using web semantic.
Any questions? Or, maybe, suggestions?
Can you give us a couple of bullets on the concept? From first appearance it looks like a Facebook like social network.
First. Manage your accounts, like fb, twitter, youtube, vimeo, flickr, gmail, foursquare in one place
ahurst, you don't need open email, twitter or fb to know if have new messages
have you researched the competition? How much activity has to be done before the begin to be able to make the educated suggestions?
@brynner7 I am not raining on your parade. At all just asking questions? Why has this not been done before?

@brynner7 I think anytime you tackle the social networking platform your doing a lot, what are some of the things that set you apart, and what do you need help with?
I second mpressme
Most consistent results is the differential. Results based on a set of information from different web services.
I need a team

Mmmm, I hear you brynner7, but Google is now displaying social results as well... and we all know nobody does it better so... what's going to drive people to your community? Marketing is my specialty...so from a marketing standpoint I'm trying to figure out what's your niche market and what the selling point to attract new visitors.

For instance, you connect your Facebook, Twitter, Foursquare, Flickr and YouTube accounts with Wup. One nice day you decide to take a vacation with your family, then you enter in the service and asks for suggestions for trips. The system displays the list vacation packages from tour operators who have positive mentions on Twitter and offer the tourist destinations in which his Facebook friends found themselves located by Foursquare. It shows photos and videos of the destination via Flickr and YouTube.
vbout, yes, but I don't wanna save again in my database, like greplin per example
Another key factor in this service is privacy. The user does not need to enter your password and your data will not be copied to the Wup database.
